biotools.summary: Web server for iterative protein sequence database searching by dynamic programming. Sensitivity and selectivity outperform PSI-BLAST. The server allows a range of different protein sequence databases to be searched including the SCOP database of protein domains.

bioschemas.name: SCANPS
bioschemas.summary: Web server for iterative protein sequence database searching by dynamic programming. Sensitivity and selectivity outperform PSI-BLAST. The server allows a range of different protein sequence databases to be searched including the SCOP database of protein domains.
